data.comment: The match is underway in Chester.
Elton Garcia awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 1, Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Miami.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Free kick Philadelphia.
In the minute 5, Andres Reyes is booked for the away team.
The match at Subaru Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sergio Santos, who is down injured.
Sergio Santos is back on the pitch.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Miami.
Elton Garcia signals a Miami throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Miami.
In the minute 12, Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Miami are pushing forward but Gonzalo Higuain's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 15, Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Miami at Subaru Park.
Gonzalo Higuain hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Miami!
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Philadelphia in Chester.
In the minute 25, Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Philadelphia have got their heads in front thanks to a Anthony Fontana strike.
Great play from Kacper Przybylko to set up the goal.
In the minute 26, Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Elton Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
In Chester Philadelphia attack through Brendan Aaronson. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Miami at Subaru Park.
Can Philadelphia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Philadelphia.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Miami.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Elton Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Elton Garcia signals a Miami throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
In the minute 40, Miami's Gonzalo Higuain is whistled for offside at Subaru Park.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Miami in the half of Philadelphia.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
The first half has been concluded at Subaru Park.
In the minute 45, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Juan Agudelo.
The second half has started at Subaru Park.
Juan Agudelo returns to the field for Miami after picking up a slight injury.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Miami make their first substitution with Robbie Robinson replacing Juan Agudelo.
In the minute 46, Sergio Santos (Philadelphia) gets a yellow card.
Attention is being given to Miamiâ€™s Leandro Gonzalez Pirez and play has been suspended briefly.
Leandro Gonzalez Pirez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 48, In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Elton Garcia signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to Miami's area.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 51, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Elton Garcia awards Miami a goal kick.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 54, Miami to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 58, Miami have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Chester to check on Anthony Fontana, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami are caught offside.
In the minute 61, Ilsinho (Philadelphia) has replaced the possibly injured Anthony Fontana at Subaru Park.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
In the minute 66, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 68, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andres Reyes for Miami who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Miami at Subaru Park.
The away team has substituted Andres Reyes with Dylan Nealis. Diego Alonso is thus making his second change.
In the minute 69, It's now 2-0 in Chester as Ilsinho scores for Philadelphia.
That's a fine assist from Kacper Przybylko.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Philadelphia needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
An attacking Miami player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 77, Elton Garcia awards Miami a penalty but Gonzalo Higuain misses from 12 yards.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
The away team replace Victor Ulloa with Wil Trapp.
Jim Curtin is making the team's second substitution at Subaru Park with Andrew Wooten replacing Sergio Santos.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Miami.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Elton Garcia.
In the minute 85, In Chester, Miami push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Kai Wagner is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 87, Elton Garcia signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
It seems as if Kai Wagner is unable to continue. Matt Real replaces him for the home team.
Corner awarded to Miami.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Miami close to the penalty box.
9 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Philadelphia's half?
Elton Garcia awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Elton Garcia signals a Miami throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
Free kick Philadelphia.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elton Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
That's full-time at Subaru Park. The final score is 3-0.
Philadelphia take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Brendan Aaronson.
